Title: Relates to the intentional removal of identifying markers from commercial motor vehicles in the city of New York
Summary: Prohibits the intentional removal of identification markers from commercial motor vehicles in the city of New York for the purpose of evading a traffic infraction; provides a fine of $200-$1000 for intentional removal of identification markers.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the transportation law, in relation to the intentional removal of identification markers from commercial motor vehicles in the city of New York
